EmailTemplate.name: PrePopulated GTS E-mail
EmailTemplate.subject: GTS Errors for Quote: Quotation.Number
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The below quote has GTS errors in need of your review 

 Opportunity Owner: Opportunity.Owner 
 SAP Quote Number: Quotation.Number

 Partner Functions: 
 Sold To: SoldtToName (SoldToERP#) 
 Distributor: DistributorName (DistributorToERP#)
 Ultimate Consignee: UCName (UCToERP#)
 Ship To: ShipName (ShipToERP#) 
 Bill To: BillName (BillERP#) 
 Payer: PayerName (PayerERP#)

 List of Material/Product Names that have GTS error
